name: Gel
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Get more costumes, more action, and more puzzles in the Full Version of Gel!  Upgrade now for a total of over 100 Puzzle Mode challenges, four full cards of Action Mode intensity, Xbox LIVE online play and unfettered access to the Item Store!  This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
